name: Pegasus Cocktail Bar
description:
Welcome to Pegasus Cocktail Bar!

It's your first shift today, right? Don't worry! Just play your cards to match what the customer wants and get points based on how close you got to it.

Got dealt a bad hand? You can redraw it twice per customer!

Good Luck! And don't drink on your shift. ;)

This game was made in 48 hours for the Nordic Game Jam 2023.
